text:
@JohnCornyn @DailyCaller Feel that Sting?
121,000 Americans are Dead because of the White House mishandling of the Coronavirus Pandemic.

You could have gotten us out of this if you had called witnesses in the Impeachment Trial.
You covered for him.

40 million Americans are out of work
Yeah, it's Trash.
